articles.title: WHO approves Sinovac Covid-19 vaccine, the second Chinese-made dose listed - TODAYonline
articles.description: GENEVA — The World Health Organization (WHO) said on Tuesday (June 1) it has approved a Covid-19 vaccine made by drugmaker Sinovac Biotech for emergency use listing, paving the way for a second Chinese shot to be used in poor countries.
